```{r hotdog data, echo=TRUE,results='hide'}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)

#data for hotdog-contest-winners excel
hotdog_win <- read_excel("ex1-2/hotdog-contest-winners.xlsm")
head(hotdog_win)

#data for hotdog-places excel
hotdog_places <- read_excel("ex1-2/hotdog-places.xlsm")
head(hotdog_places)

#data for obama excel
obama_rate <- read_excel("ex1-2/obama-approval-ratings.xls")
head(obama_rate)
```


```{r bar, echo=TRUE,results='hide'}
library(ggplot2)

#making the plot using hotdog_win
ggplot(data=hotdog_win,aes(x=Country,y=`Dogs eaten`)) + geom_bar(stat="identity",fill="steelblue")+theme_minimal()
```

```{r stacked, echo=TRUE,results='hide'}
#grouping by winner to show total number of dogs eaten in each country by each winner
ggplot(data=hotdog_win,aes(fill=Winner,y=`Dogs eaten`,x=Country)) + geom_bar(position="stack",stat="identity")
```


```{r pie, echo=TRUE,results='hide'}
bp <- ggplot(obama_rate,aes(x="",y=None,fill=Issue))+geom_bar(width=1,stat="identity")
bp

pie <- bp + coord_polar("y",start=0)
pie
```
```{r donut, echo=TRUE,results='hide'}
library(dplyr)
#setting size to allocate space for hole/circle
hsize <- 4

#adding new variable to hotdog_win 'x' 
hotdog_win <- hotdog_win %>% mutate(x=hsize)

#plot donut chart
ggplot(hotdog_win,aes(x=hsize,y=`Dogs eaten`,fill=Country))+geom_col()+coord_polar(theta="y")+xlim(c(0.2,hsize+0.5))
```
